Direct Item Hints.Progressive Slam: LADIES AND GENTLEMEN! IT APPEARS THAT ONE FIGHTER HAS COME UNEQUIPPED TO PROPERLY HANDLE THIS REPTILLIAN BEAST. PERHAPS THEY SHOULD HAVE LOOKED IN ANGRY AZTEC OR GLOOMY GALLEON FOR THE ELUSIVE SLAM.
